description: Allows one to find informations about a topic on wikipedia

intents.name: DoSearch
utterances: i need some online info about {finland:=>What}
get me informations from {wikipedia:=>Engine} about {barrack obama:=>What}
can you do a search about {nuclear weapons:=>What} on {wikipedia:=>Engine} please
can you please find me some informations about {America:=>What} on {wikipedia:=>Engine}
can you get some online informations for me please
can i get some online informations
do some online research for me
i need some online information please
can you find some informations on {wikipedia:=>Engine} please
can you get me some informations online
i need you to do an online search
could you search some info online
can you search some informations online
